messages.subject: RE: [nihontostudy] Bying on ebay. Don´t get cheeted.
messages.msgSnippet: Mike, Check this eBay page for information on how to proceed when you are cheated of an item by the seller:
messages.messageBody:
Mike,

Check this eBay page for information on how to proceed when you are
cheated of an item by the seller:
http://pages.ebay.com/help/confidence/isgw-fraud-protection.html

You'll find full info and links there.

Good luck recovering the money or the item.

Best Regards,

Andres

-----Original Message-----
From: Mike Cavanaugh [mailto:mike@...]
Sent: Tuesday, May 18, 2004 10:42 AM
To: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: [nihontostudy] Bying on ebay. Don´t get cheeted.


I too, had a bad experience with a purchase on e-bay only it was in the
amount of over $6000!
Does anyone have a phone number or e-mail address for the person or
persons that are responsible for the website? I have tried for over a
year to get in touch with them without any luck. I just want to let
them know that a company called "Atlanta Leasing" is very dishonest in
their dealings.
Thanks, Mike

-----Original Message-----
From: Rob Smith [mailto:max348@...]
Sent: Tuesday, May 18, 2004 10:04 AM
To: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [nihontostudy] Bying on ebay. Don´t get cheeted.


I am sorry to hear of your misfortune.There is truly nothing worse than
a thief...
I appreciate the warning, and hope that you ultimately receive your
funds back. Or better yet, the Kiyosada.
Good luck friend,
Rob
----- Original Message -----
From: Allan Schrattenholz
To: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Tuesday, May 18, 2004 8:33 AM
Subject: [nihontostudy] Bying on ebay. Don´t get cheeted.


At present you can find a Kiyosada japanese Sword with NBTHK papers
for sale on ebay. I bought this sword the 21th. of february 2004,
payed it but never received it. By request I received several other
photos of the sword and the NBTHK papers as well as copies from his
passport and driverslicense. This information is avaible for the
list if you don´t find it inconvenient. Look well at this sword on
ebay and take care of wolflady 137 and jnetweb as well as John
Pivec, Minneapolis, USA. This sword will without any doubt be put
for sale again. If anyone has this sword in their possession, please
let me know. I will award informations which will place the sword at
my house with 1000 U.S.dollars. If the Nihonto study group find it
appropiate I will put photos of the sword as well as John Pivecs
passport and driverslicense, on the list.
The Danish Criminal Police, The Danish Foreign Ministry and the USA
Police are involved in the investigation and I have asked ebay to
help with information as well.
Thankyou for your help in advance
All the best
Allan
